2D_Nonlinear_Convection.mms: u(x, y, t) = exp(-t) * sin(πx) * sin(πy), v(x, y, t) = exp(-t) * cos(πx) * cos(πy)

2D_Burgers_Equation.pde: ∂u/∂t + u ∂u/∂x + v ∂u/∂y = ν (∂²u/∂x² + ∂²u/∂y²) + f_u(x, y, t), ∂v/∂t + u ∂v/∂x + v ∂v/∂y = ν (∂²v/∂x² + ∂²v/∂y²) + f_v(x, y, t)
2D_Burgers_Equation.mms: u(x, y, t) = exp(-t) * sin(πx) * sin(πy), v(x, y, t) = exp(-t) * cos(πx) * cos(πy)

2D_Wave_Equation.mms: u(x, y, t) = exp(-t) * sin(πx) * sin(πy) * cos(t)

2D_Euler_Equations.mms: ρ(x, y, t) = exp(-t) * sin(πx) * sin(πy), u(x, y, t) = exp(-t) * sin(πx) * cos(πy), v(x, y, t) = exp(-t) * cos(πx) * sin(πy), p(x, y, t) = exp(-t) * (1 + sin(πx) * sin(πy))

2D_Navier_Stokes.pde: ∂u/∂t + u ∂u/∂x + v ∂u/∂y = -1/ρ ∂p/∂x + ν (∂²u/∂x² + ∂²u/∂y²), ∂v/∂t + u ∂v/∂x + v ∂v/∂y = -1/ρ ∂p/∂y + ν (∂²v/∂x² + ∂²v/∂y²), ∂²p/∂x² + ∂²p/∂y² = -ρ (∂u/∂x ∂u/∂x + 2 ∂u/∂y ∂v/∂x + ∂v/∂y ∂v/∂y)
2D_Navier_Stokes.mms: u(x, y, t) = exp(-t) * sin(πx) * sin(πy), v(x, y, t) = exp(-t) * cos(πx) * cos(πy), p(x, y, t) = exp(-t) * cos(πx) * cos(πy)
